definition: back of neck/item/thing/term (in a mathematical formula)/sum (of money)/classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc

sentences.english: Circumcise therefore the foreskin of your heart, and be no longer stubborn.
sentences.chinese: 所以你們要將心裏的污穢除掉，不可再硬著頸項。

sentences.english: A protruding collarbone and a long, elegant neck were also the focus of secondary erogenous zones in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，突出的鎖骨和修長優雅的頸項也是性感區域。

sentences.english: But they, our forefathers, became arrogant and stiff-necked, and did not obey your commands.
sentences.chinese: 但我們的列祖行事狂傲，硬着頸項不聽從你的誡命。

sentences.english: Its fur is yellow-brown, with a darker vest and collar.
sentences.chinese: 它的毛皮呈黃褐色，前胸後背與頸項的顏色要深一些。

sentences.english: Thy neck is as a tower of ivory;
So shall they be life unto thy soul, and grace to thy neck.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，他必作你的生命，頸項的美飾。

sentences.english: So they came forward and placed their feet on their necks.
sentences.chinese: 他們就近前來，把腳踏在這些王的頸項上。

sentences.english: He closes to her, the inhalation warming up is small and soft to linger nigh in her nape.
sentences.chinese: 他靠近她，溫熱的呼吸細細縈繞在她頸項處。

sentences.english: Do you have pain or stiffness in your neck?
sentences.chinese: 你有頸項痛或頸項強直嗎？

sentences.english: Do you have pain or stiffness in your neck?
sentences.chinese: 你有頸項痛或頸項強直嗎？

sentences.english: For I know how rebellious and stiff-necked you are.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我知道你們是悖逆的，是硬着頸項的。

sentences.english: Circumcise your hearts, therefore, and do not be stiff-necked any longer.
sentences.chinese: 所以你們要將心裏的污穢除掉，不可再硬着頸項。

sentences.english: A dyed embroidery, two embroideries, For the neck of the spoiler.
sentences.chinese: 這一兩件繡花的綵衣，乃是披在擄掠者頸項上的。

sentences.english: Bind them in thy heart continually, and put them about thy neck.
sentences.chinese: 應將二者常刻在你心中，系在你的頸項上。

sentences.english: And the LORD said to me, "I have seen this people, and they are a stiff-necked people indeed!
sentences.chinese: 耶和華又對我說，我看這百姓是硬着頸項的百姓。

sentences.english: Soh has a tumor on his neck?! ?

definition: to fiddle with/to tamper with/to meddle with/to move randomly/to flail about
cervical vertebra/the seven cervical vertebrae in the neck of humans and most mammals
